K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:1b-5: thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:10b-8: dge slong de dbyung bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:10b-9: gal te dge slong nyi shur gcig gis ma tshang ba'i tshogs kyi dge 'dun gyis dge slong de 'byin par byed na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:10b-10: dge slong de yang ma phyin la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:10b-11: dge slong de dag kyang smad par bya ba yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:10b-12: de la de ni cho ga yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:10b-13: de la bdag gis tshe dang ldan pa dag la ci 'di la khyed yongs su dag gam zhes dri'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:10b-14: ci 'di la khyed yongs su dag gam zhes lan gnyis lan gsum du dri'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:10b-15: 'di la tshe dang ldan pa dag yongs su dag na 'di ltar cang mi smra bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:10b-16: sdom la; dben pa skyabs yod 'dug pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:10b-17: tshe dang ldan pa dag ma nges pa'i chos gnyis po 'di dag ni zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo 'don pa las 'byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:10b-18: yang dge slong gang bud med kyi yul dang lhan cig gcig pu gcig bu dang dben pa skyabs yod pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:10b-19: 'dod pa byar rung ba stan la 'dug par byed cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:11a-0: de la gal te dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pas chos @11a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:11a-1: gsum po pham par gyur pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:11a-3: ltung byed las chos gang yang rung bas smras par gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:11a-4: dge slong gis 'dug par khas blangs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:11a-5: chos gsum po pham par gyur pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:11a-8: chos gang yang rung bas byed du gzhug cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:11a-9: dge slong de la dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pas chos gang dang gang gis smras par gyur pa'i chos de dang des dge slong de byed du gzhug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:11a-10: de ni ma nges pa'i chos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:11a-11: yang dge slong gang bud med kyi yul dang lhan cig gcig pu gcig dang dben pa skyabs yod pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:11a-12: 'dod pa byar mi rung bar stan la 'dug par byed cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:11a-13: de gal te dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pas chos gnyis po dge 'dun lhag ma'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:11a-14: ltung byed las chos gang yang rung bas smras par gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:11a-15: dge slong gis 'dug par khas blangs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:11a-16: chos gnyis po dge 'dun lhag ma'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:11a-17: ltung byed las chos gang yang rung bas byed du gzhug cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:11a-18: dge slong de la dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:11a-19: chos gang dang gang gis smras par gyur pa'i chos de dang des /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:11a-20: dge slong de byed du gzhug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:11a-21: de yang ma nges pa'i chos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:11a-22: tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag gis ma nges pa'i chos gnyis po dag bton zin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:11a-23: de la bdag gis tshe dang ldan pa dag la ci 'di la khyed yongs su dag gam zhes dri'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:11b-0: @11b ci 'di la khyed yongs su dag gam zhes lan gnyis lan gsum du dri'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:11b-1: 'di la tshe dang ldan pa dag yongs su dag na 'di ltar cang mi smra bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:11b-5: slong dang stod g-yogs smad g-yogs bcas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:11b-6: rin thang so sor bskur ba'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:11b-7: tshe dang ldan pa dag spang ba'i ltung byed kyi chos sum cu po 'di dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:11b-8: zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo 'don pa las 'byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:11b-9: dge slong chos gos zin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:11b-10: sra brkyang phyung na zhag bcu'i bar du gos lhag pa rnam par ma brtags pa bcang bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:11b-11: de las 'das par 'chang na spang ba'i ltung byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:11b-12: dge slong chos gos zin pas sra brkyang phyung na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:11b-13: gal te nub gcig kyang chos gos gsum las chos gos gang yang rung ba dang mtshams kyi phyi rol tu 'bral bar byed na; dge 'dun gyis gnang ba ma gtogs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:11b-15: dge slong chos gos zin pas sra brkyang phyung na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:11b-16: dus ma yin pa'i gos shig rnyed la 'dod na dge slong des gos de blang bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:11b-17: blangs nas gal te langs na myur ba kho nar gos su byas la bcang bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:11b-18: gal te mi langs la kha ma langs pa kha skong ba'i gos la re ba yod na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:11b-19: dge slong des chos gos de zla ba gcig gi mthar gzhag par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:11b-20: de las 'das par 'jog na spang ba'i ltung byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:11b-21: yang dge slong gang dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la gos rnying pa 'khrur 'jug gam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:12a-1: 'jug na spang ba'i ltung byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:12a-2: yang dge slong gang dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa las gos len na brjes pa ma gtogs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:12a-4: yang dge slong gang khyim bdag gam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:12a-5: khyim bdag gi chung ma nye du ma yin pa'i gan du song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:12a-6: gos slong na dus ma gtogs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:12a-8: de la dus ni 'di yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:12a-14: de la de ni dus yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:12a-19: gos chus khyer na khyim bdag gam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:12a-20: khyim bdag gi chung ma nye du ma yin pa'i gan du song la gos bslang bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:12a-21: de la gal te bram ze'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:12a-22: khyim bdag dad pa can zhig gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:12a-23: dus kyis gos mang po stobs la 'dod na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:12a-24: dge slong des de las gos stod g-yogs smad g-yogs dang bcas pa'i mthar thug pa blang bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:12a-25: de las lhag par ben na spang ba'i ltung byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:12a-26: dge slong gi phyir khyim bdag gam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:12a-27: khyim bdag gi chung ma nye du ma yin pas gos kyi rin dag spags nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:12a-28: bdag gi gos kyi rin 'di dag gis gos 'di dang 'di lta bu zhig nyos la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:12a-29: dge slong ming 'di zhes bya ba 'ongs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:12a-30: de la gos rung ba dus su bskon no snyam pa las de na gal te dge slong de la sngar ma bstabs par rnam par rtog pa 'ga' zhig byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:12b-0: bzang po 'dod @12b pa'i phyir khyim bdag gam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:12b-1: khyim bdag gi chung ma nye du ma yin pa de'i gan du song nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:12b-2: 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pas bdag gi phyir gos kyi rin gang dag spags pa'i gos kyi rin de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa gos 'di dang 'di lta bu zhig nyos la bdag la gos rung ba dus su legs par skon cig ces smras te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:12b-3: gos grub pa na spang ba'i ltung byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:12b-4: dge slong gi phyir khyim bdag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:12b-5: khyim bdag gi chung ma nye du ma yin pas gos kyi rin so so ba de dag spags nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:12b-6: bdag cag gnyis kyis gos kyi rin so so ba 'di dag gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:12b-7: gos 'di dang 'di lta bu so so bdag nyos la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:12b-8: dge slong ming 'di zhes bya ba 'ongs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:12b-9: bdag cag gnyis kyis so so nas de la gos rung ba dus su bskon no snyam pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:12b-10: de na gal te dge slong de la sngar ma bstabs par rnam par rtog pa 'ga' zhig byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:12b-11: bzang po 'dod pa'i phyir khyim bdag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:12b-12: khyim bdag gi chung ma nye du ma yin pa de dag gi gan du song nas 'di skad ces /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:12b-13: tshe dang ldan pa dag gis bdag gi phyir gos kyi rin so so ba dag spags pa'i gos kyi rin so so ba de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa dag gos 'di dang 'di lta bu so so ba dag nyos la gnyi ga 'dus te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:12b-14: bdag la gos rung ba zhig dus su legs par skon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:12b-16: gos grub pa na spang ba'i ltung byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:12b-17: dge slong gi phyir rgyal po'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:13a-0: @13a *// ded dpon gyis pho nya'i lag tu gos kyi rin dag bskur bar gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:13a-1: de nas pho nya de gos kyi rin de dag khyer nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:13a-2: dge slong de ga la ba der song ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:13a-3: dge slong de la 'di skad ces 'phags pa mkhyen par mdzod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:13a-12: ded dpon che ge mos gos kyi rin 'di dag bskur gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:13a-13: 'phags pas thugs brtse ba'i slad du 'di dag bzhes shig ces zer na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:13a-14: dge slong des pho nya de la 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa pho nya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:13a-15: dge slong dag ni gos kyi rin dag len du mi rung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:13a-16: bdag cag gos rung ba dus su rnyed pa na ni len to zhes brjod par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:13a-17: gal te pho nya des dge slong de la 'di skad ces 'phags pa rnams kyi zhal ta bgyid pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:13a-18: 'phags pa rnams kyi zhal ta nyams su len pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:13a-19: gang lags pa 'ga' mchis sam zhes zer na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:13a-20: dge slong gos 'dod pas pho nya la 'di skad ces /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:13a-21: tshe dang ldan pa pho nya 'di ni dge slong rnams kyi zhal ta byed pa ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:13a-22: 'di ni dge slong rnams kyi zhal ta nyams su len pa'o zhes /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:13a-24: dge bsnyen zhal ta byed pa bstan par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:13a-25: de nas pho nya des gos kyi rin de dag khyir nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:13a-26: zhal ta byed pa ga la ba der 'gro bar bya zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:13b-0: phyin nas zhal ta byed pa la 'di skad ces tshes dang ldan pa zhal ta @13b byed pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:13b-2: khyod kyis gos kyi rin 'di dag gis gos 'di dang 'di lta bu zhig nyos la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:13b-3: dge slong ming 'di zhes bya ba 'ongs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:13b-4: de la gos rung ba dus su skon cig ces brjod par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:13b-5: de nas pho nya des zhal ta byed pa de la shin tu legs par yang dag par bsgo zhing yang dag par bstan nas dge slong de ga la ba der 'gro bar bya zhing phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:13b-6: dge slong de la 'di skad ces 'phags pas zhal ta bgyid pa bstan pa gang lags pa de la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:13b-7: bdag gis yang dag par bstan lags kyis de'i gan du bzhud cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:13b-8: des khyod la gos rung ba dus su bskon par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:13b-10: dge slong gos 'dod pas zhal ta byed pa'i gan du song nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:13b-11: tshe dang ldan pa zhal ta byed pa bdag gos 'dod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:13b-12: tshe dang ldan pa zhal ta byed pa bdag gos 'dod do zhes lan gnyis lan gsum du bskul bar bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:13b-14: lan gnyis lan gsum du bskul zhing dran par byas pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:13b-15: gal te gos de grub na de lta na legs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:13b-16: gal te ma grub na lan bzhi lan lnga lan drug gi bar du phyogs su cang mi zer bar bsdad par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:13b-17: lan bzhi lan lnga lan drug gi bar du phyogs su cang mi smra bar bsdad pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:13b-18: gal te gos de grub na de lta na legs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:13b-20: de'i 'og tu gos bsgrub pa'i phyir /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:13b-23: gal te ma grub na phyogs gang nas gos kyi rin de dag 'ongs pa der bdag 'gro bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:14a-1: na yid brtan pa'i pho nya las tshe dang ldan pa dag gis dge slong che ge mo'i phyir gos kyi rin gang dag bskur ba de dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:14a-2: dge slong de'i don cir yang ma grub kyis shes par gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:14a-3: tshe dang ldan pa dag gis rang gi nor chud ma gzan cig ces spring bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:14a-4: de la de ni cho ga yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:14a-6: srin bal 'ba' zhig cha gnyis dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:14a-7: drug dang mtho gang lam dang ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:14a-8: 'khru ba dang ni gser dngul dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:14a-9: mngon mtshan can dang nyo tshong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:14a-10: yang dge slong gang srin bal gyi stan gsar pa byed na spang ba'i ltung byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:14a-11: yang dge slong gang lug bal nag po 'ba' zhig gi stan gsar pa byed na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:14a-13: dge slong gis stan gsar pa byed na cha gnyis ni lug bal nag po 'ba' zhig las gzhug par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:14a-14: gsum pa ni dkar po las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:14a-15: bzhi pa ni 'khob bal las gzhug par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:14a-16: gal te dge slong gis cha gnyis lug bal nag po 'ba' zhig las ma bcug gam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:14a-18: bzhi pa 'khob bal las ma bcug par stan gsar pa byed na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:14a-20: dge slong gis stan gsar pa byed na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:14a-21: mi 'dod bzhin du lo drug tu bcang bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:14a-22: gal te dge slong lo drug tshun chad du stan rnying pa de spangs kyang rung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:14a-24: stan gsar pa gzhan byed na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:14a-25: dge 'dun gyis gnang ba ma gtogs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:14a-27: dge slong gis gding ba gsar pa byed na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:14b-0: @14b sar pa kha dog mi sdug par bya ba'i phyir /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:14b-1: gding ba rnying pa bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang 'khor bas glan par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:14b-2: gal te dge slong gis gding ba sa bar kha dog mi sdug bar bya ba'i phyir /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:14b-3: gding ba rnying pa bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang 'khor bas ma glan par gding ba sar pa spyod na spang ba'i ltung byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:14b-4: dge slong lam du zhugs pas lug bal dag rnyed la 'dod na dge slong des blang bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:14b-5: blangs nas khyer ba med na dpag tshad gsum gyi mtha'i bar du bdag nyid kyis bskur bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:14b-6: de las 'das par khyer na spang ba'i ltung byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:14b-7: yang dge slong gang dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la lug bal 'khrur 'jug gam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:14b-11: yang dge slong gang rang gi lag gis gser dngul len tam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:14b-12: gzhan len du 'jug na spang ba'i ltung byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:14b-13: yang dge slong gang mngon mtshan can gyi spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byed na spang ba'i ltung byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:14b-14: yang dge slong gang nyo tshong rnam pa sna tshogs byed na spang ba'i ltung byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:14b-16: lhung bzed gnyis dang tha ga gnyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:14b-17: byin 'phrog ston zla tha chung dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:14b-18: dgon pa pa dang ras chen dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:14b-19: bsngos pa dang ni gsog 'jog go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:14b-20: yang dge slong gis lhung bzed lhag pa zhag bcu'i bar du bcad par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:14b-21: de las 'das par 'chang na spang ba'i ltung byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:14b-23: lhung bzed lhan ba lnga med pa spyad bzod pa yod bzhin du /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:15a-1: bzed sar pa gzhan tshol zhing lhung bzed grub na spang ba'i ltung byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:15a-2: dge slong des lhung bzed de dge slong gi 'khor la dbul bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:15a-3: dge slong gi 'khor de'i lhung bzed tha mar gyur pa gang yin pa de dge slong de la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:15a-4: dge slong khyod kyis lhung bzed 'di byin gyis brlab par mi bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:15a-6: gzhan la sbyin par mi bya bar chag pa'i mthar thug gi bar du khad kyis dal bu dal bus spyad par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:15a-8: de la de ni cho ga yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:15a-9: yang dge slong gang rang gi lag gis bslangs pa'i dog pas tha ga pa nye du ma yin pa la 'thag tu 'jug na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:15a-10: gos grub na spang ba'i ltung byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:15a-11: dge slong gi phyir khyim bdag gam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:15a-12: khyim bdag gi chung ma nye du ma yin pas tha ga pa nye du ma yin pa la gos 'thag tu bcug pa las /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:15a-14: tha ga pa nye du ma yin pa'i gan du song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:15a-15: 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa tha ga pa shes par gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:15a-16: gos 'di ni kho bo'i phyir 'thag gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:15a-17: tshe dang ldan pa tha ga pa gos 'di zheng che ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:15a-20: tha ga ran bzang bar legs par gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:15a-21: tshe dang ldan pa tha ga pa 'di ltar kho bos gla rngan 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:15a-24: bza' rgyu cung zad cig sbyin no zhes smras nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:15b-0: de la gal te dge slong des gos sgrub pa'i phyir @15b gla rngan 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:15b-3: bza' rgyu cung zad cig sbyin zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:15b-4: gos grub na spang ba'i ltung byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:15b-5: yang dge slong gang dge slong la ges byin nas de'i 'og tu khros 'khrugs rngams par gyur te yid ma rangs nas 'phrog gam 'phrog tu 'jug cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:15b-6: de la 'di skad ces dge slong khyod la gos mi sbyin gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:15b-7: phyir byin cig ces zer na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:15b-8: dge slong des lhag ma yod pa phyir sbyin par bya zhing btang na spang ba'i ltung byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:15b-9: dge slong gis ston zla tha chung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:15b-10: nyar zhag bcus ma tshang ba tshun chad du brtad pa las byung ba'i gos shig rnyed la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:15b-11: 'dod na dge slong des gos de bslang bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:15b-12: bslangs nas gos sbyin pa'i dus kyi bar du bcang bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:15b-13: de las 'das par bcang na spang ba'i ltung byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:15b-14: dge slong rab tu mang po dag gnas mal dgon pa dogs pa dang bcas par grags pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:15b-15: 'jigs pa dang bcas par grags pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:15b-16: 'jigs pa tha dad pas 'jigs su rung ba dang bcas par grags pa dag tu dbyar phyi mar gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:15b-17: dge slong dgon pa pas 'dod na chos gos gsum las chos gos gang yang rung ba khyim gzhan du gzhag par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:15b-18: dge slong dgon pa pa la mtshams kyi phyi rol du 'gro dgos pa de lta bu'i rkyen zhig byung na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:15b-19: dge slong dgon pa pa des zhag drug gi mtha' tshun chad du chos gos de dang mtshams kyi phyi rol tu 'bral bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:15b-20: de las 'das par 'bral na spang ba'i ltung byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:16a-0: dge slong rnams kyis so ga @16a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:16a-1: rnams kyi zla ba gcig lus na dbyar gyi gos ras chen btsal bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:16a-2: dbyar zad nas 'og tu zla ba phyed kyi bar du bcang bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:16a-3: gal te dge slong gis so ga rnams kyi zla ba gcig lus pa'i sngon rol tu dbyar gyi gos ras chen tshol bar byed dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:16a-4: dbyar zad nas 'og tu zla ba phyed las lhag par 'chang na spang ba'i ltung byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:16a-5: yang dge slong gang dge 'dun la bsngos pa'i rnyed pa shes bzhin du gang zag bdag la sgyur du 'jug na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:16a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong na ba rnams la phan pa so sor bsten par bya ba'i sman gang dag bka' stsal pa 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:16a-11: bu ram gyi dbu ba de dag las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:16a-12: dge slong na bas 'dod na rang gis zhag bdun par byin gyis brlabs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:16a-13: gsog 'jog gis yongs su longs spyod pas yongs su longs spyad par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:16a-14: de las 'das par yongs su longs spyod par byed na spang ba'i ltung byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:16a-15: tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag gis spang ba'i ltung byed kyi chos sum cu po dag bton zin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:16a-16: de la bdag gis tshe dang ldan pa dag la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:16a-17: ci 'di la khyed yongs su dag gam zhes dri'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:16a-18: ci 'di la khyed yongs su dag gam zhes lan gnyis lan gsum du dri'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:16a-19: 'di la tshe dang ldan pa dag yongs su dag na /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:16b-0: bam po gnyis @16b pa ste tha ma'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:16b-2: shes bzhin dang ni sa bon dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:16b-3: ma bskos pa dang yang yang dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:16b-4: chu dang khyim dang bsams bzhin dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:16b-5: mgron mang rkun ma mchod ston no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:16b-7: rdzun skyon dge slong phra ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:16b-8: skyo sngogs byed dang ston pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:16b-9: 'don dang gnas ngan len dang chos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:16b-10: bshes ngor byed dang khyad du gsod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:16b-11: tshe dang ldan pa dag ltung byed kyi chos dgu bcu po 'di dag ni zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo 'don pa las 'byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:16b-12: shes bzhin du brdzun du smra na ltung byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:16b-13: mi'i skyon nas smra na ltung byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:16b-14: dge slong la phra ma byed na ltung byed do; ;yang dge slong gang dge 'dun mthun pas chos bzhin du rtsod pa sbyangs par shes bzhin du yang las kyis skyo sngogs byed na ltung byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:16b-15: yang dge slong gang bud med kyi yul la tshig lnga'am drug las lhag par chos ston na /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:16b-17: yang dge slong gang gang zag bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dang tshig gis chos 'don na ltung byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:16b-18: yang dge slong gang gang zag bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa la gnas ngan len gyi ltung ba brjod na /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:16b-21: yang dge slong gang sngar legs par rung bar byas nas de'i 'og tu 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag gis 'di ltar bshes ngor byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:17a-0: @17a *// dge 'dun gyi rnyed par bsngos pa bdag gi gang zag la bsngos so zhes zer na ltung byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:17a-1: yang dge slong gang zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don pa na; 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag gang dag gis dge slong rnams 'gyod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:17a-3: gnod par 'gyur ba bslab pa'i gzhi phran tshegs rab tu phra ba 'di dag gis /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:18b-0: yang dge slong gang @18b shes bzhin du dge slong mas sbyor du bcug pa'i zas za na sngar khyim du bos pa ma gtogs te /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:19a-27: yang dge slong gang shes bzhin du srog chag dang bcas pa'i chu la spyod na ltung byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:19b-0: yang dge slong gang shes bzhin du nyal po byed par shom pa'i khyim du phyis gnon @19b byed de stan la 'dug na ltung byed do //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:27b-7: 'greng ste lhung bzed mi bkru bar bslab par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:27b-8: gad ka ma yin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:27b-9: g-yang sa ma yin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:27b-10: dkan gzar po ma yin par lhung bzed bkru bar bslab par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:27b-11: 'bab chu drag po'i rgyun las bzlog ste lhung bzed kyis chu mi bcu bar bslab par bya'o //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:27b-15: mi na bar mdun du 'gro ba la phyi nas 'gro zhing chos mi bshad par bslab par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:27b-16: mi na bar lam nas 'gro ba lam gyi 'gram nas 'gro zhing chos mi bshad par bslab par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:27b-17: mi na bar mgo g-yogs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:27b-20: gnya' gong du bsnol ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:27b-21: ltag par bsnol ba la chos mi bshad par bslab par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:27b-22: mi na bar skra do ker can dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:28a-1: mgo dkris pa la chos mi bshad par bslab par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:28a-2: mi na bar glang po che zhon pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:28a-5: zhon pa'i steng na 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:28a-6: mchil lham gyon pa la chos mi bshad par bslab par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:28a-7: mi na bar lag na 'khar ba thogs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:28a-8: lag na gdugs thogs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:28a-9: lag na mtshon thogs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:28a-10: lag na ral gri thogs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:28a-11: lag na dgra cha thogs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:28a-12: go cha gyon pa la chos mi bshad par bslab par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:28a-13: mi na bar 'greng ste bshang gci mi bya bar bslab par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:28a-14: mi na bar chu'i nang du bshang gci dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:28a-18: rlugs pa mi dor bar bslab par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:28a-19: mi na bar rtsva sngon po yod pa'i sa phyogs su bshang gci dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:28a-22: rlugs pa mi dor bar bslab par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:28a-23: gnod pa byung ba ma gtogs pa shing la mi gang tsam las mthor mi 'dzeg par bslab par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:28a-24: tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag gis bslab pa'i chos mang po rnams bton zin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:28a-25: de la tshe dang ldan pa dag ci 'di la khyed yongs su dag gam zhes dri'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:28a-26: ci 'di la khyed yongs su dag gam zhes lan gnyis lan gsum du dri'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:28a-27: 'di la tshe dang ldan pa dag yongs su dag na 'di ltar cang mi smra bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:28a-29: mngon sum dran pa ma myos dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:28b-0: de bzhin @28b gang mang ngo bo nyid //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:28b-1: rtsva rnams bkram pa lta bu dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:28b-2: khas blang par yang bya ba'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:28b-3: tshe dang ldan pa dag rtsod pa zhi bar bya ba'i chos bdun po 'di dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:28b-4: zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo 'don pa las 'byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:28b-5: mngon sum gyis 'dul bar 'os pa la mngon sum gyis 'dul ba sbyin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:28b-6: dran pas 'dul bar 'os pa la dran pas 'dul ba sbyin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:28b-7: ma myos pas 'dul bar 'os pa la ma myos pas 'dul ba sbyin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:28b-8: gang tshul shing mang po sbyin par 'os pa la tshul shing mang po sbyin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:28b-9: de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa la de'i ngo bo nyid btsal ba sbyin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:28b-10: rtsva bkram pa lta bu 'os pa la rtsva bkram pa lta bu sbyin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:28b-11: gang khas blang bar 'os pa la khas blang pa sbyin par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:28b-12: rtsod pa byung bar gyur pa rnams rtsod pa zhi bar bya ba'i chos bdun po 'di dag gis chos dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:28b-14: ston pa'i bstan pa bzhin du dul bar bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:28b-17: tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag gis rtsod pa zhi bar bya ba'i chos bdun po dag bton zin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:28b-18: de la bdag gis tshe dang ldan pa dag la ci 'di la khyed yongs su dag gam zhes dri'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:28b-19: ci 'di la khyed yongs su dag gam zhes lan gnyis lan gsum du dri'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:28b-20: 'di la tshe dang ldan pa dag yongs su dag na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:28b-21: 'di ltar cang mi smra bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:28b-22: tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag gis so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa'i gleng gzhi bton zin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:28b-23: pham par gyur pa'i chos bzhi dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:29a-2: ma nges pa'i chos gnyis dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:29a-3: spang ba'i ltung byed kyi chos sum cu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:29a-4: ltung byed kyi chos dgu bcu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:29a-5: so sor bshags par bya ba'i chos bzhi dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:29a-6: bslab pa'i chos mang po brgya rtsa bcu gnyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:29a-7: rtsod pa zhi bar bya ba'i chos bdun po dag bton zin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:29a-8: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i mdor gtogs shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:29a-9: mdor bsdus pa ni 'di dag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:29a-10: gang gzhan nas 'byung ba chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos de la yang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:29a-14: mi rtsod par sems kun tu bsrung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:29a-16: bag yod pas rnal 'byor du bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:29a-17: bzod pa dka' thub dam pa bzod pa ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:29a-18: mya ngan 'das pa mchog ces sangs rgyas gsung //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:29a-19: rab tu byung ba gzhan la gnod pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:29a-20: gzhan la 'tshe ba dge sbyong ma yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:29a-21: mig ldan 'gro ba yod pa yis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:29a-22: nyam nga ba dag ji bzhin du //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:29a-24: sdig pa dag ni yongs su spong //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:29a-25: skur pa mi gdab gnod mi bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:29a-26: so sor thar pa'ang bsdam par bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:29a-27: zas kyi tshong kyang rig par bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:29a-28: bas mtha'i gnas su gnas par bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:29a-29: lhag pa'i sems la yang dag sbyar //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:29a-30: 'di ni sangs rgyas bstan pa yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:29a-31: ji ltar bung ba me tog las //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:29a-32: kha dog dril mi gnong par //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:29a-33: khu ba bzhibs nas 'phur ba ltar //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:29a-34: de bzhin thub pa grong du rgyu //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:29a-35: bdag gi rigs dang mi rigs la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:29b-0: @29b brtag par bya ste gzhan rnams kyi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:29b-1: mi mthun pa dang gzhan dag gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:29b-2: byas dang ma byas rnams la min //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:29b-3: lhag pa'i sems la bag bya ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:29b-4: thub pa'i thub gzhi rnams la bslab //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:29b-5: nyer zhi rtag tu dran pa yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:29b-6: skyob pa mya ngan med pa yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:29b-7: sbyin pas bsod nams rab tu 'phel //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:29b-8: legs bsdams dgra sogs mi 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:29b-9: dge dang ldan pas sdig pa spong //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:29b-10: nyon mongs zad pas mya ngan 'da'//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:29b-11: sdig pa thams cad mi bya ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:29b-12: dge ba phun sum tshogs par spyad //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:29b-13: rang gi sems ni yongs su 'dul //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:29b-14: 'di ni sangs rgyas bstan pa yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:29b-15: lus kyi sdom pa legs pa ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:29b-16: ngag gi sdom pa'ang legs pa yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:29b-17: yid kyi sdom pa legs pa ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:29b-18: thams cad du ni sdom pa legs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:29b-19: kun tu bsdams pa'i dge slong ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:29b-20: sdug bsngal kun las rab tu grol //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:29b-21: ngag rnams bsrung zhing yid kyis rab bsdams te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:29b-22: lus kyi mi dge bdag mi byed cing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:29b-23: las lam gsum po 'di dag rab sbyangs na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:29b-24: drang srong gsungs pa'i lam mi 'thob par 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:29b-25: sangs rgyas rnam gzigs gtsug tor thams cad skyob //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:29b-26: 'khor ba 'jig dang gser thub 'od srung dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:29b-27: sh'akya thub pa go'u ta ma lha yi lha //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:29b-28: mi 'dul kha lo sgyur ba bla na med //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:29b-29: 'jig rten mgon po skyob pa mchog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:29b-30: sangs rgyas dpa' bo bdun po dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:29b-31: grags ldan rnams kyi so sor thar //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:29b-32: 'di ni rab tu rgyas par bton //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:29b-33: 'di la sangs rgyas rnams dang gang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:29b-34: sangs rgyas nyan thos rnams kyang gus //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:29b-35: 'di la gus dang bcas gyur pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:30a-2: brtsam par bya zhing 'byung bar bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:30a-3: sangs rgyas bstan la 'jug par bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:30a-4: 'dam bu'i khyim na glang chen bzhin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:30a-5: 'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:30a-6: gang zhig rab tu bag yod par //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:30a-8: skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:30a-9: sdug bsngal tha mar byed par 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:30a-10: phan tshun tshul khrims bsrung ba dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:30a-11: bstan pa 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:30a-12: so sor thar pa 'di bton pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:30a-13: dge 'dun gyis ni gso sbyong byas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:30a-14: gang gi phyir ni mdo bton dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:30a-15: gang phyir gso sbyong byas gyur pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:30a-16: tshul khrims de ni bsrung bya ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:30a-17: g-yag rnga'i rtse mo ji bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:30a-18: so sor thar pa bton pa yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:30a-19: bsod nams grub pa gang yod pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:30a-20: des ni 'jig rten ma lus pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:30a-21: thub dbang go 'phang thob par shog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:30a-22: so sor thar pa'i mdo rdzogs so ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:30a-23: 'phags pa gzhi thams cad yod par smra ba'i 'dul ba 'dzin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:30a-24: kha che bye brag tu smra ba'i slob dpon dzi na mi tra dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:30a-25: zhu chen gyi lo tstsha ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-001:30a-26: ban dhe cog gru klu'i rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o //
